ygData.msgSnippet: Seeing only Darkwing while searching for enemies he flew in his direction. The bullets fired by both did little but scratch Ragnus s paint as his armor was too

From: "Ragnus _" <ragnus_@...>

  Seeing only Darkwing while searching for enemies he flew in his direction. 
  The bullets fired by both did little but scratch Ragnus's paint as his 
armor was too thick for their caliber.  The missles launched by Darkwing 
narrowly missed his as he pulled a roll/dodge manuver to get out of the way. 
  With his manuverability it would be nearly impossible to hit Ragnus from 
head on.  Luckly for the attackers they had another two missles that were 
closing in unnoticed by the Dragon.  The missles were nearly at impact when 
Ragnus had just got into biting range of Darkwing.

  Rearing his head back he bit at Darkwing.  As he clamped his jaws shut 
both of the other two missles slammed into him, sening shards of armor 
everywhere.

>Dreadwind and Darkwing saw the enormous dragon, as it flew out.
>The now two jets flew at the dragon, one on each side, letting loose
>a barrage of bullets and four missiles.
